Projects.title: SimplifyVMS
desc: A comprehensive visitor management system website that I contributed to. The platform focuses on simplifying visitor tracking and management for businesses. I worked on the backend API development to ensure seamless integration with various frontend modules.
The project involved building secure, scalable APIs and optimizing data flows to support high-traffic scenarios. My role also included enhancing system reliability and performance.

Projects.title: Dropified
desc: Implemented the API and frontend for Dropified, a powerful dropshipping platform. My work focused on integrating third-party APIs and building interactive frontend components to improve user experience.
The project included optimizing API endpoints for smooth data exchange and building reusable React components with attention to performance and accessibility.

Projects.title: ProspectX
desc: Developed both the API and frontend of ProspectX, a SaaS platform for lead generation and prospecting. Integrated payment gateways to enable seamless subscription handling and billing.
Worked closely on secure API endpoints and frontend payment UI integration, ensuring a reliable and user-friendly checkout process.

Projects.title: Unation
desc: Built microservices APIs for Unation, a platform focused on community engagement and content management. Utilized AWS S3 for media storage, Docker for containerization, and Scrapy for web scraping data ingestion.
This project involved designing scalable microservice architectures and implementing robust data pipelines to support dynamic content features.

Projects.title: Almouassa
desc: Developed the API backend for Almouassa, a platform delivering specialized services. Focused on building RESTful APIs to handle user data securely and efficiently.
The API was designed to be scalable and maintainable, supporting seamless integration with client applications.

Projects.title: Suhaib Webb
desc: Built both API and frontend using React for join.suhaibwebb.com, a website supporting community engagement and content delivery.
The project required close coordination between frontend components and API endpoints to provide a seamless user experience with dynamic content updates.

Projects.title: CalvaryCo Store
desc: Built CalvaryCo Store from scratch, an e-commerce website designed to provide an intuitive and smooth shopping experience. Developed the entire frontend and backend stack to ensure high performance and scalability.
Implemented responsive UI components and integrated payment systems to allow secure transactions.

Projects.title: Data Scrapers
desc: Implemented multiple data scrapers for major websites including Google Maps, Fifty5Places, Zodoc, and Mapbox. These scrapers collected structured data to support various business intelligence and analysis needs.
Used Python, Scrapy, and other web scraping tools to develop efficient, scalable scrapers that handle large volumes of data with minimal downtime.
